pre.style: font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.5; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 10px; background-color: #f5f5f5; border-radius: 8px; color: black;

div.pre: 🗻 Shaurya Pratap Singh | B.Tech @ IIT Delhi ------------------------ ⚡ Projects : Dim · Silicon 💻 Skills : Web Dev · ML · Code Optimization 🖥️ Tools : Neovim · VS Code · Docker · Git 🚀 Focus : AI · Data Science · Open Source ✨ Interests: Anime · Tech · Startups
